description:
* Based on the Chii`s Sweet Home manga series written and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr2146 [Konami Kanata] and serialised in Weekly Morning.
http://anidb.net/ch7450 [Chii] is living happily with http://anidb.net/ch10238 [Youhei] while his http://anidb.net/ch10240 [father] and http://anidb.net/ch10239 [mother] continue to try and keep her presence a secret from the landlady. When a relative in Hokkaido offers to take Chii in, Youhei`s parents decide that it would be best for her if she moved away. With just a month left with the young kitten, they are finding it difficult to say goodbye. Upon receiving a phone call saying that Chii will be moving away sooner than expected, Youhei and his parents realize that they can`t give her up. Deciding once and for all that Chii is part of their family, Youhei`s parents promptly find a new place to live, one that allows pets. As the family prepares to move into their new apartment, will Chii be able to adapt to her new surroundings?

REGULAR.description:
Chi wants to go somewhere. The family talk about sending Chi to Hokkaido.
Source: crunchyroll

Dad dreams that Chi is missing, and worries if they should send her away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, 連れて行かれる.

REGULAR.description:
Yohei is shocked when Chi is going to be sent away.
Source: crunchyroll

Yohei is extremely sad because he doesn`t want to part with Chi. Mom and dad decide to...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, もう一度決まる.

REGULAR.description:
The Yamada family has decided to move so they are extremely busy. Chi play in the cardboard boxes and begins to daydream.
Source: crunchyroll

The Yamadas finish packing. Chi panics because the house is different from their previous one.
Source: crunchyroll

The Yamadas have straightened up the rooms. Chi is reminded of a sweet memory.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, 思い出される.

REGULAR.description:
The Yamadas are happy with the move but Chi doesn`t understand why they moved.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi is bothered by the smell of the new home.
Source: crunchyroll

The unfamiliar smells still exists and Chi considers reclaiming all her things.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi climbs up the stairs. She is higher than everyone else and in good spirits when all of a sudden...
Source: crunchyroll

Chi is uneasy because she is unable to get used to the new place. She wonders if this is a good place for her.
Source: crunchyroll

The Yamadas show Chi how to use the cat door. At first, she doesn`t understand but…
Source: crunchyroll

The Yamadas bring Chi to meet their neighbors, the Akashi`s and Furugawa`s.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, 挨拶する. (前編)

REGULAR.description:
The next place the Yamadas visit are the Ijyuin`s. There, they meet the refined cat, Alice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, 挨拶する. (後編)

REGULAR.description:
Finally, they visit the neighbors living right next door, the Kusanos. The Kusanos have a dog named David.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi is playing in the garden at the new house where she bumps into the next door neighbor`s dog, David.
Source: crunchyroll

When Chi ran into David in the garden, she noticed something.
Source: crunchyroll

The Ijyuin`s cat Alice goes to the Yamada`s. She is always so graceful, or so we think.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi chases a butterfly in the garden where she finds David and Alice.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi realizes that she doesn’t know where the street will lead her when she decides to follow a cat she doesn’t know.
Source: crunchyroll

While following the cat, she arrives upon a place that brings back old memories.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, ウキウキする.

REGULAR.description:
Chi gets an uncomfortable feeling at her previous home and realizes she no longer recognizes this place.
Source: crunchyroll

Auntie Mi-ke said it was okay to live with her but Chi wanted to return to the Yamadas.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi is walking about the house with her filthy feet while mom is struggling to catch her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, 跡をつけられる.

REGULAR.description:
Chi seems to be very interested in many things, especially dangerous items such as an iron.
Source: crunchyroll

Yohei brought over his friends from school. Three of them started to play with Chi
Source: crunchyroll

Chi angered Ryu-kun and his friends so she tries many things to make it up to them
Source: crunchyroll

Chi unexpectedly ran into the pet shop owner in the park. Chi looked at the owner and...
Source: crunchyroll

Dad and the pet shop`s owner were comparing to see who`s cat was cuter.
Source: crunchyroll

The day of the cat contest! The shop owner wasn`t able to bring Minya...
Source: crunchyroll

Chi meets the shop owner again but she thinks it`s Minya. She runs after Chi.
Source: crunchyroll

Mi-chan is acting strangely. Chi says Mi-chan`s her usual boring self...
Source: crunchyroll

Lucky, the parrot, is good at mimicking words. Chi starts to play games with Lucky.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi goes crazy running around through many things when dad decides to make a playground just for Chi.
Source: crunchyroll

The Yamadas keep tossing and turning which prevents Chi from getting a good night`s rest. She goes around the house looking for a good sleeping spot.
Source: crunchyroll

Tomorrow is Yohei`s birthday. Chi gets excited about the gift dad bought for him.
Source: crunchyroll

The Yamadas are having Yohei`s birthday party at their place. Chi starts playing with the white box that happens to smell delicious!
Source: crunchyroll

Yohei`s birthday party - Ryu-kun and his friends got him a mask for his birthday but...
Source: crunchyroll

To remember Yohei`s birthday, the Yamadas and Chi take a photo together.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi goes to the shopping district for the first time in extremely high spirits where there`s another cat that`s been watching her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, ぶらりとする.

REGULAR.description:
Tama-san is the cat that saved Chi. Tama-san scolded Chi and told her to be more careful around humans.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi makes her debut at Tama-san`s cat meeting. There, Chi meets the legendary cat, Buji-san.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, デビューする.

REGULAR.description:
The cat meeting has started. Buji-san`s words deeply moved the crowd, but Chi...
Source: crunchyroll

Chi went to Alice`s place to play but she wasn`t there. The Ijyuin`s began to entertain Chi but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, もてなされる.

REGULAR.description:
Chi goes to the pet salon. With a severe look in her eyes, Chi asks Alice for help but...
Source: crunchyroll

Dad always has a hard time when he brushing Chi`s teeth. Chi, who hates this, never opens her mouth.
Source: crunchyroll

Dad bought a bunch of goods specifically to brush cats` teeth. He`s going to use each item in an attempt to brush Chi`s teeth.
Source: crunchyroll

In order to prep Chi for the family trip, they took her on a bus ride.
Source: crunchyroll

The Yamadas bought a car for the family trip. Chi was immediately intrigued with it and began playing inside the car.
Source: crunchyroll

It`s Chi`s first time riding in a car. At first she was scared but then she begins to enjoy it.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi jumped out of the car at the drive through. The Yamadas look for her and as they glance back, Chi is...
Source: crunchyroll

Dad was in high spirits which was interrupted when Chi falls down.
Source: crunchyroll

Mom and Dad play tennis. Chi is intrigued by watching the ball go back and forth.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi went to the Fuji-san`s home. While playing, she unintentionally falls asleep.
Source: crunchyroll

A dog suddenly appeared at the cats` meeting. Chi surprised Tama-chan and the other cats by standing up to the dog.
Source: crunchyroll

The Yamadas decorated their home with bamboo and small slips of paper to write wishes on in preparation for Tanabata. Chi became interested in these decorations.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi was disappointed when they moved the tree away. Yohei wrote down a wish as he looked at Chi.
Source: crunchyroll

It suddenly began to rain and Chi got soaked! She went to find shelter from the rain with not much luck.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, びしょびしょになる.

REGULAR.description:
Chi is soaking wet from the rain. She goes with Tama-san to look for someplace to stay dry.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi becomes very interested in a bug that flies in the house. There`s a ruckus as the Yamadas are taking a nap.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi gets in the way of cleaning so mom finally starts to vacuum Chi!
Source: crunchyroll

Mom says Yohei and Chi act very similar to each other. At first, dad is a bit doubtful...
Source: crunchyroll

Yohei and Chi are watching the house. Then suddenly, they get frightened by the sound of a chime and they began to scream!
Source: crunchyroll

Alice and Tama-san`s cooking battle! They are both making delicious food for Chi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, ごちそうになる.

REGULAR.description:
Alice and Tama-san watch over Chi and have a mutual understanding of protecting her.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi climbs up a tree to where she sees a locust. When she looks down, she`s surprised about how high up she is.
Source: crunchyroll

In order to save Chi, Ryu-kun does his best. In doing so, Ryu-kun overcomes his fear of cats.
Source: crunchyroll

The Yamadas are having Flowing Somen*. Chi`s has gotten pretty good at it when eventually something happens.  *Somen is very thin, white Japanese noodles made of wheat flour. *Flowing Somen is when somen is put in water flowing along a long bamboo gutter. You catch the noodles with your chopsticks and dip them in the broth and eat it.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi is watching the portable shrine for the first time and getting very excited. Tama-san is very fond of it and begins to talk about the festival
Source: crunchyroll

Tama-san is teaching Chi about the way of enjoying the festival. However, Chi begins to have her own carefree fun.
Source: crunchyroll

When Tama-san wasn`t paying attention to Chi for a mere second, she was sweep away by someone. Tama-san went to save her but...
Source: crunchyroll

Mom and Dad are trying to find Chi`s favorite toy which causes a bit of a commotion and tires Chi out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, 人気者になる.

REGULAR.description:
Chi`s is ecstatic when she sees the balloon. It gets a bit crazy in the house which troubles mom a bit.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi follows David on his walk and as she`s strolling along, falls into a garbage can.
Source: crunchyroll

David noticed Chi`s situation.　He dragged his owner, Kusano-kun, to go and save Chi.
Source: crunchyroll

The Yamadas took a trip to Hokkaido. Everyone is together but they had to separate from Chi on the boat.
Source: crunchyroll

They finally arrived to Hokkaido. Chi was extremely happy when she meets Julie-chan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, 北海道を走る.

REGULAR.description:
Chi goes to a farm. She starts to entertain herself when she does something to the horse.
Source: crunchyroll

At night, Yohei was frightened by a ghost. There were some sounds coming from the ceiling. What could it possibly be?
Source: crunchyroll

Chi found the chicks` pen and try to get to them until the parents of the chicks appear.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, とり囲まれる.

REGULAR.description:
Chi meets a cow for the first time. She is so happy but is accidentally stained with milk!
Source: crunchyroll

Julie-chan shows Yohei the thing she treasures the most.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi meets a Northern fox. They both act similarly, get along and become friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, キタキツネにあう.

REGULAR.description:
Mr. Yamada has to work and can`t play with Chi; But Chi always cause trouble and can`t stay still.
Source: crunchyroll

Kusano Yuki comes over to the Yamadas to play with David. Chi tries to play with David in the yard.
Source: crunchyroll

The pet store lady comes to visit Chi and brings her some pet clothes. When Chi runs away from the pet store lady`s dress-up session, Chi finds Youhei with Mrs. Yamada, playing with Mayu and Ryu. When the pet store lady finds her, there`s a surprise.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi is going to the cat meeting and Alice comes along and tries to fit in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, いっしょに行く.

REGULAR.description:
Mom broke Chi’s toy so she decided to handmake a toy for her.
Source: crunchyroll

Dad is running late to his meeting. When he opens his bag, he finds Chi there.
Source: crunchyroll

Yohei is practicing the pianica but can’t seem to play it well as Chi comes along.
Source: crunchyroll

The Yamadas have a flower bed in their garden. As they are all sowing the garden, Chi gets in the way by playing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, 種まきをする.

REGULAR.description:
Chi reminisces about Kuroino. She sees something black in a stopped pickup truck that looks like Kuroino.
Source: crunchyroll

The pickup truck that Chi’s on begins to move. Where will she be taken?
Source: crunchyroll

Chi arrives at an unknown plot of land where three cats appear.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi stays with the cats that help her. The next morning, Chi is pointed in the right direction back to the Yamadas.
Source: crunchyroll

As Chi was on her way home, she ran into Tama-san’s younger sister, Hana-san.
Source: crunchyroll

Again, Chi was on her way home but many things happened along the way.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi is pretty tired. She’s thinking about the Yamadas and heading home but…
Source: crunchyroll

Chi fell over and couldn’t move when a black cat appeared.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi meets Kuroino again. Kuroino takes Chi all the way to her home.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi always returns to the park. She is a bit upset when she hears that Kuroino is going home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チー, もう一度約束する.

REGULAR.description:
In an effort to find Chi, Yohei meets her at the place when they first met.
Source: crunchyroll

Chi finally returns home so they have a big party for her return!
Source: crunchyroll
